document_data.name: Deva's Bile
document_data.mainbody: '''Deva's Bile''' was a type of dangerous alcohol created in the [[Abyss]]al city of [[Samora]], on the layer of [[Azzagrat]].
document_data.Description: Deva's Bile was a rare [[fiend]]ish drink. It was hard to find outside Samora's breweries. The concoction was deadly to those from the [[Prime Material plane]] and for some lucky mortal imbibers â€“ survivable but [[poison]]ous. Those who survived consuming Deva's Bile went into a roaring drunk rage and, eventually, succumbed to violent illness.
